## Introduction

This document visualizes results of the international [survey by Winton Centre for Risk and Evidence Communication](https://www.cam.ac.uk/stories/wintoncovid1) about people's attitudes towards the risk of coronavirus, and their governmentsâ€™ reactions.
Data were collected in the period 19 - 29th of March 2020.
